response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $18,000 to us, reflecting its high quality, functionality, and unique features. We believe it could be a perfect fit for you, offering unparalleled benefits that align with your requirements. Considering its worth and the value it can bring to you, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $17,000. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 17000}
